ActivateSecurityProfile.name: ActivateSecurityProfile
ActivateSecurityProfile.description: Grants permission to activate the security profile

AssociateDataSource.name: AssociateDataSource
AssociateDataSource.description: Grants permission to associate security profile with a data source

CreateDataSource.name: CreateDataSource
CreateDataSource.description: Grants permission to create a new data source

CreateSecurityProfile.name: CreateSecurityProfile
CreateSecurityProfile.description: Grants permission to create a new security profile

DeactivateSecurityProfile.name: DeactivateSecurityProfile
DeactivateSecurityProfile.description: Grants permission to deactivate the security profile

DeleteDataSource.name: DeleteDataSource
DeleteDataSource.description: Grants permission to delete a data source

DisassociateDataSource.name: DisassociateDataSource
DisassociateDataSource.description: Grants permission to disassociate security profile from a data source

GetDataSource.name: GetDataSource
GetDataSource.description: Grants permission to retrieve the details of an existing data source

GetEntitledSecurityProfileSnapshot.name: GetEntitledSecurityProfileSnapshot
GetEntitledSecurityProfileSnapshot.description: Grants permission to return the details of a security profile snapshot that requester is entitled to read

GetProfileAccessTerms.name: GetProfileAccessTerms
GetProfileAccessTerms.description: Grants permission to get the access terms for a vendor insights profile

GetSecurityProfile.name: GetSecurityProfile
GetSecurityProfile.description: Grants permission to return the details of an existing security profile

GetSecurityProfileSnapshot.name: GetSecurityProfileSnapshot
GetSecurityProfileSnapshot.description: Grants permission to return the details of a security profile snapshot

ListDataSources.name: ListDataSources
ListDataSources.description: Grants permission to list existing data sources

ListEntitledSecurityProfileSnapshots.name: ListEntitledSecurityProfileSnapshots
ListEntitledSecurityProfileSnapshots.description: Grants permission to return the snapshot summary list for an existing security profile that requester is entitled to list

ListEntitledSecurityProfiles.name: ListEntitledSecurityProfiles
ListEntitledSecurityProfiles.description: Grants permission to list entitled security profiles

ListSecurityProfileSnapshots.name: ListSecurityProfileSnapshots
ListSecurityProfileSnapshots.description: Grants permission to return the snapshot summary list for an existing security profile

ListSecurityProfiles.name: ListSecurityProfiles
ListSecurityProfiles.description: Grants permission to list existing security profiles

ListTagsForResource.name: ListTagsForResource
ListTagsForResource.description: Grants permission to list tags for vendor insights resource

TagResource.name: TagResource
TagResource.description: Grants permission to tag vendor insights resource

UntagResource.name: UntagResource
UntagResource.description: Grants permission to untag vendor insights resource

UpdateDataSource.name: UpdateDataSource
UpdateDataSource.description: Grants permission to update an existing data source

UpdateSecurityProfile.name: UpdateSecurityProfile
UpdateSecurityProfile.description: Grants permission to update the security profile

UpdateSecurityProfileSnapshotCreationCon.name: UpdateSecurityProfileSnapshotCreationConfiguration
UpdateSecurityProfileSnapshotCreationCon.description: Grants permission to update the security profile snapshot creation configuration

UpdateSecurityProfileSnapshotReleaseConf.name: UpdateSecurityProfileSnapshotReleaseConfiguration
UpdateSecurityProfileSnapshotReleaseConf.description: Grants permission to update the security profile snapshot release configuration
